description: Describes an Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels dataset. You can get information such as the current status of a dataset and statistics about the images and labels in a dataset. This operation requires permissions to perform the rekognition:DescribeDataset action.

parameters.name: DatasetArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset that you want to describe.

nested_items.name: CreationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp for the time and date that the dataset was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp for the date and time that the dataset was last updated.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message for the dataset.

nested_items.name: StatusMessageCode
nested_items.description: The status message code for the dataset operation. If a service error occurs, try the API call again later. If a client error occurs, check the input parameters to the dataset API call that failed.

nested_items.name: DatasetStats
nested_items.description: The status message code for the dataset.

nested_items.name: LabeledEntries
nested_items.description: The total number of images in the dataset that have labels.

nested_items.name: TotalEntries
nested_items.description: The total number of images in the dataset.

nested_items.name: TotalLabels
nested_items.description: The total number of labels declared in the dataset.

nested_items.name: ErrorEntries
nested_items.description: The total number of entries that contain at least one error.
